poem.title: Georgie Porgie
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Giz a kiss! Eh? Gie us the keys. Oh. Up to the gills on God knows what. Random gigs At retro grills Where girls and boys Come out to play. Smoky grids and griddles, The owner girds her loins And segues into brunch. Another day! She grins. The wee yin girns. Do something about the Décor. Who gilds Plaster these days? Mediaeval guilds. She gives up.
